alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 19 at 11:14AM CDT until May 22 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Arkansas... Ouachita River At Felsenthal Lock and Dam affecting Union and Ashley Counties. For the Ouachita River...including Felsenthal Lock and Dam...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ouachita River At Felsenthal Lock and Dam, Arkansas. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Minor lowland flooding in the Felsenthal National Wildlife Refuge to end Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Thursday the pool stage was 70.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river pool stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM CDT Thursday was 71.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood pool stage by Friday evening and continue falling to 67.8 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood pool stage is 70 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Friday afternoon at 1245 PM CDT.
